name: SmartPath
headline: Financial wellness for the middle class
description: SmartPath is a financial wellness company based in Atlanta, GA.  We offer unique workplace financial wellness programs centered around 1-on-1 financial coaching.  SmartPath wellness programs are designed to increase the bottom line for both employers and employees.

founders.name: Alok Deshpande, Founder/President
founders.description: I teach everyday people about money. My wife of 17 years and 14 yr old son tolerate it :)  Former Bain, HBS, Emory. Love all Atlanta sports (which is difficult).

# Empower your PARTICIPANTS with comprehensive financial education
# Empower Your
#  Participants
# With Financial Education
SmartPath's comprehensive financial education solutions include daily classes, one-on-one coaching, and interactive tools covering a variety of personal finance topics. By partnering with us, you can increase revenue, maximize organizational excellence, and differentiate your business. Let us fuel your success, so you can fuel the success of those you serve.
[Schedule A Demo](http://joinsmartpath.com/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/czalmanek/meetsmartpath>)
![The SmartPath homepage greets the user and guides them on a personalized financial education journey.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/6503866f351df41bceb881a0_smartpath-hero.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f2162b617569224ab80b46_line-1.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f2178387b976f532d41950_line-2.svg)

![13+ years providing financial education](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f21992743962dc92c62acd_Group%2097.svg)

## Our Products
SmartPath provides unbiased and actionable financial guidance, including education, personal coaching, and user-driven insights, so you can build loyalty and trust with those you serve.
![One of SmartPath's popular retirement classes titled: I'm Investing in my 401\(k\)...What's Next?](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f21eb3c2be7267d75e495c_product-image%20\(1\).png)
![SmartPath Learn logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f21f3d4154d2c176b4c643_Logo_Stacked_Learn.png)
Live and on-demand personal finance classes covering over 130 different topics.
[Learn MoreArrow Right](http://joinsmartpath.com/</learn>)
![SmartPath Coach Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f21f3d890b774214d3523b_Logo_Stacked_Coach.png)
One-on-one coaching with a dedicated financial professional.
[Learn MoreArrow Right](http://joinsmartpath.com/</coach>)
![The user platform makes it easy for users to schedule an appointment with a certified financial coach. ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f220d1e36d896066615062_product-image-2%20\(1\).png)
## A solution for everyone
SmartPath is the perfect complement to any business. We educate your population to make sound financial decisions, then deliver key insights and learnings back to you. Leveraging advanced AI technology, we offer best-in-class, personalized financial education that will give you the edge to outpace your competition.
![Increase contributions by educating participants on retirement planning and optimizing their savings.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f22233ada40165e9773a33_Group%2099.svg)

## Experience SmartPath for Yourself!
Check out our demo for an insider look at the user-friendly interface and interactive features that make SmartPath the go-to resource for financial learning.
![Diverse hands "all-in" showing SmartPath's customized service and messaging, ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/6514939cb72d2da1ad55b857_Homepage_AI.webp)
Product Feature
### SmartPath's AI-driven personalization engine
SmartPath’s proprietary AI-powered personalization engine ensures that every user achieves maximum benefit by personalizing our resources and making recommendations based on their unique demographics and interests. **We are the only provider in the financial education industry leveraging this advanced technology.**
[Schedule A Demo](http://joinsmartpath.com/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/czalmanek/meetsmartpath>)
## See why customers love SmartPath!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f266bad07d6fdd706d2dec_quote.svg)
“Tracking my money has helped me plan better. I like to travel and shop. When I have a trip coming up I always make a goal to have a certain amount of spending money to splurge on vacation. SmartPath helps me maintain the FUEL I need for future events.”
Jaymi R.
SmartPath User
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f266bad07d6fdd706d2dec_quote.svg)
SmartPath is a valued partner of HII’s Benefits & Wellbeing mission. The SmartPath team is a delight to work with – truly engaged and great thought partners. Our SmartPath account manager goes above and beyond – she cares and it shows in her work product.
Marisa Strickland
Corporate Benefits Manager
HII
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f266bad07d6fdd706d2dec_quote.svg)
SmartPath has been the cornerstone of Lumen’s financial well-being program since we launched a pilot in 2017. I participated in the original pilot program and it turned out to be the best thing I’ve ever done for myself and my family. My personal experience has made me the biggest champion of SmartPath, and I truly believe every single one of our employees should speak with a SmartPath coach.
Charlie Ho
Lead Benefits Analyst
Lumen
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f266bad07d6fdd706d2dec_quote.svg)
“Having a SmartPath Financial Coach is one of the best and smartest decisions I’ve made in my life.”
Heather J.
SmartPath User
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f266bad07d6fdd706d2dec_quote.svg)
“They will demystify personal finance and give you a reasonable method to follow.”
Sylvia B.
SmartPath User
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f266bad07d6fdd706d2dec_quote.svg)
Your format is engaging – casual but simple and clear, and you make a technically complicated benefit less daunting and easy to understand.
Lalaine Balois
Benefits Consultant
Leidos
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f266bad07d6fdd706d2dec_quote.svg)
SmartPath will help guide our employees through buying a house, paying down debt, saving for retirement, understanding the unique GoDaddy total rewards package, and much more. It's been a pleasure to partner with the entire SmartPath team. It's been a pleasure to partner with the entire SmartPath team!
Rob Wisniewski
Director of Benefits
GoDaddy
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f266bad07d6fdd706d2dec_quote.svg)
Best thing that ever happened to me. SmartPath changes your financial life and is a must have!
Teodora N.
SmartPath User
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f266bad07d6fdd706d2dec_quote.svg)
“The SmartPath Financial Coach helped our family become less stressed about our finances, showed us that you have to measure it to improve it, and encouraged us to live within our means.”
Trina C.
SmartPath User
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f266bad07d6fdd706d2dec_quote.svg)
SmartPath has created a solution for the set of people that have the most to gain from tracking their money. More importantly, they did it in a way that solves our employees’ problems in simple terms. This is a company that takes the stress out of financial planning and makes lives better on a global scale.
Karen Velkey
Vice President of Benefits and Compensation
HII
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f266bad07d6fdd706d2dec_quote.svg)
Without an understanding of how to build a foundation for financial wellness, overall wellness for the diverse performer is unlikely. The team at SmartPath offers the diverse performers at our conferences an actionable framework for addressing this important need.
Werten Bellamy
President
Stakeholders, Inc.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f79a0b4e8135a8a2e6c9b8_Frame%2014.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f205445005fd88ad5ca350/64f79a0ba1c9f44c7cce6dea_Frame%20138.svg)

generated_description:
**SmartPath: Empowering Financial Wellness for the Middle Class**

Founded in 2016 during Y Combinator's Batch S16, SmartPath is a fintech company based in Atlanta, GA, dedicated to improving financial wellness for the middle class. With a team of 16 passionate employees, they focus on providing unique workplace financial wellness programs that include personalized one-on-one coaching.

### What They Do:
SmartPath offers comprehensive financial education solutions aimed at both employees and employers. Their services include **SmartPath Learn**, which features live and on-demand classes covering over 130 personal finance topics, and **SmartPath Coach**, providing personalized coaching sessions with certified financial professionals. This dual approach not only helps individuals make sound financial decisions but also enhances the bottom line for businesses by promoting a financially savvy workforce.

### Why Choose SmartPath?
SmartPath champions the mission of making financial education accessible and actionable, particularly for middle-class families. With **99% client retention** and support for over **600,000 users**, they are recognized on the **2024 Inc. 5000 list** for fastest-growing private companies. Their offerings leverage advanced AI technology to deliver personalized educational experiences tailored to each user’s unique needs and demographics.

### Solutions for Everyone:
SmartPath serves various stakeholders, including:

- **Employers** looking to enhance their benefits packages.
- **Retirement Plan Advisors** aiming to increase contributions and optimize savings for clients.
- **Fintech companies** wanting to integrate comprehensive financial education into their platforms.

### Testimonials & Impact:
Clients, such as **Leidos** and **Lumen**, rave about the transformative impact of SmartPath's coaching and classes on their employees' financial wellbeing. Users share how the program has demystified personal finance, contributing to reduced stress and improved financial planning.

### Get Started:
Interested in bringing SmartPath’s financial wellness expertise to your workplace? Discover how their programs can fuel financial success for both employees and organizations alike by visiting their website: [joinsmartpath.com](http://joinsmartpath.com).

In a world where financial knowledge can often feel overwhelming, SmartPath stands out as a beacon of clarity, guiding individuals toward a brighter financial future. Let them help you pave the way!
